room_title: Escape room "Below Ground" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: Our group of 6 thoroughly enjoyed Below Ground. It was difficult but Megan was a huge help. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Below Ground" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: Amazing room- we played with a group of 5 (which we recommend as its hard with less people). The decoration was very impressive and the room was very immersive. I highly suggest it if you are looking for a fun time with friends and like escape rooms. I believe they have it in Tahoe as well but we havenâ€™t tried it. Highly recommend

room_title: Escape room "Below Ground" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: Puzzle Room Reno was so much fun! Karly's storyline for our group entering Underground was well acted. The experience was immersive and proved to be a difficult task to complete. I'm looking forward to tackling their three other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Below Ground" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: We completed "Below Ground" successfully for a birthday. Kary and everyone else were awesome! The whole process was smooth even though we added two more people last minute. Now we want to do the rest of the rooms.
